ินีธึึึีซีกีตีซ ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจ ีฐีกีต-ีกีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีขีกีถีกีฏึีกีตีซีถ ีฃีธึีฎีจีถีฉีกึีซ ีพีฅึีกีขีฅึีตีกีฌ ีกีผีกีปีซีถ ีฐีฅึีฉีซีถ ีธึีฒีฅึีฑ ีฅีถ ีีซีกึีตีกีฌ ีีกีฐีกีถีฃีถีฅึีซีถ, ีถีทีธึีด ีง ีฉีธึึึีกีฃีฅีฟ ีีฅีฌีฌีซ ีีซีถีกีฝีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีดึ ีีก ีฐีซีทีฅึีถีธึีด ีง ิทึีคีธีฒีกีถีซ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ยซีดีซีปีกีถึึีซยป ีพีฅึีกีขีฅึีตีกีฌี ีกีตีถ ีฐีกีดีกึีฅีฌีธีพ ีถีกีญีกีบีกีตีดีกีถ ีญีกีฒีกีฒีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีบีกีตีดีกีถีกีฃึีซ ีฝีฟีธึีกีฃึีดีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกึึ ินีธึึึีกีฃีฅีฟีจ ีฏีกึีฎีธึีด ีง, ีธึ ีฉีธึึึีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีธีฒีดีจ ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ีดีฅีฎ ึีกีฉีฅีฉ ีฏีกึีธีฒ ีง ีกีฏีถีฏีกีฌีฅีฌ ีีธึีฝีกีฝีฟีกีถีซึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธีพ ีกีถึีถีฅีฌีซึ ีณีกีถีกีบีกึีฐีซ ีฐีกึึีธึีดึ

media:group.media:title: Turkey โhopes forโ Armenia-Azerbaijan normalization soon, says Erdoฤan
media:group.media:description:
๐ Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoฤan expressed hope that Armenia and Azerbaijan will sign a normalization agreement by the end of the year. ๐ Dozens of Nagorno-Karabakh Armenians protested in Yerevan asking for the governmentโs help repatriating the bodies of soldiers killed in Azerbaijanโs attack last September. ๐ Armeniaโs Investigative Committee alleges that former Artsakh official Sargis Galstyan began spying for Azerbaijan after the end of the 2020 war. ๐ Former Nagorno-Karabakh resident Rashid Beglaryan, who was taken prisoner by Azerbaijan last August, was sentenced by a Baku court to 15 years in prison.

entry.title: Armenia's renewed drive towards public administration reform

media:group.media:title: Armenia's renewed drive towards public administration reform
media:group.media:description:
In this in-depth discussion, Viktorya Aydinyan, advisor to the Deputy Prime Minister of Armenia, delves into the countryโs public administration reform agenda. She examines the goals and early progress of efforts aiming to modernize governance, enhance service delivery, and improve policy planning. Aydinyan addresses the challenges of driving transformation across the government, and empowering citizens with a more participatory, digitally-oriented civil service.
